TopicTitle: Is indestructible facility a cheat? Is that why I can’t get achievements?

Articles.Content:
I’m stuck, I made a rover for kerban out of 4 crew cabins (I saw a video on it a few months ago, and remade it with 4 instead of 2)

 

is there a set design to the “rover achievement” or just a craft that moves around on the surface of a planet.

https://www.playstationtrophies.org/game/kerbal-space-program/trophy/145789-Mun-Rover--Mun-Rover.html

Trophy sites say you just need a craft marked as a rover type on the surface of a planet. Sometimes the game misattributes vehicle types, so you would need to rename the vehicle to change its type.

The only thing that counts as cheats is if the cheats menu was opened. You can check if cheats are disabled on a save by using the cheat code: up up down down left right left right. When you do, a prompt will warn you that enabling cheats will disable trophies/achievements. You can back out of the prompt to not enable cheats. If the prompt doesn't appear, then cheats were already enabled on that save.

On 1/15/2021 at 1:06 AM, InfernoSD said:

https://www.playstationtrophies.org/game/kerbal-space-program/trophy/145789-Mun-Rover--Mun-Rover.html

Trophy sites say you just need a craft marked as a rover type on the surface of a planet. Sometimes the game misattributes vehicle types, so you would need to rename the vehicle to change its type.

The only thing that counts as cheats is if the cheats menu was opened. You can check if cheats are disabled on a save by using the cheat code: up up down down left right left right. When you do, a prompt will warn you that enabling cheats will disable trophies/achievements. You can back out of the prompt to not enable cheats. If the prompt doesn't appear, then cheats were already enabled on that save.

Yes. To get certain trophies this has happened pend to me before. I’m still bitter about getting a fly by of Dre s up not getting the trophy. A second attempt of on it’s way.
